message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $140 for the product.
Okay, Alice, I appreciate you meeting me closer to the middle.  How about $100?  That's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $100. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get at least $130 for the product.
